translatedText: 可视化微积分中的两个核心运算。 （下面修正小错误）
input: Visualizing two core operations in calculus.  (Small error correction below)

translatedText: 另一种同样有价值的支持形式是分享一些视频。
input: An equally valuable form of support is to simply share some of the videos.
Special thanks to these supporters: http://3b1b.co/divcurl-thanks

translatedText: 我在可汗学院关于这个主题的工作：https://www.khanacademy.org/math/multivariable-calculus/multivariable-derivatives
input: My work on this topic at Khan Academy: https://www.khanacademy.org/math/multivariable-calculus/multivariable-derivatives

translatedText: 4:55更正，旁白应该说“逆时针旋转产生正卷曲，顺时针旋转产生负卷曲”。不过，该图是正确的。
input: Correction at 4:55, the narration should say "counterclockwise rotation gives positive curl, clockwise rotation gives negative curl".  The diagram is correct, though.

translatedText: 对于更多有趣的流体流动插图（这极大地影响了我制作该视频的动画方式），我认为您会非常喜欢这个网站：
input: For more fun fluid-flow illustrations, which heavily influenced how I animated this video, I think you'll really enjoy this site:
